casebody.data:
No. 896,

Misc.

Ostrofsky et al. v. United Steelworkers of America, AFL-CIO, et al. Bernard W. Rubenstein for petitioners. Arthur J. Goldberg and David E. Feller for the United Steelworkers of America, and John H. Morse, Ralph L. McAfee and H. Vernon Eney for Bethlehem Steel Co., respondents.

C. A. 4th Cir. Certiorari denied.
